ali.speaker: Other Man
ali.text: I killed my brother… and this is the price.

ali.speaker: Player
ali.text: W-What? What is this… why… why is he here?!

ali.speaker: Other Man
ali.text: Why was I cursed when he wasn't?

ali.speaker: Other Man
ali.text: Everything happens for a reason… even death has its message.

ali.speaker: Player
ali.text: No… this can't be real… you… you killed your brother!

ali.speaker: Other Man
ali.text: Yes… and everyone who enters this place will know fear… and you will feel what I felt.

ali.speaker: Player
ali.text: I… I need to get out of here… I don’t want to end up like… him…

ali.speaker: Other Man
ali.text: Escape?! Now you are part of the game… and you won’t leave until you understand true fear.

customer1.speaker: Customer
customer1.text: You... what are you doing here? This place is not meant for you.

customer1.speaker: Player
customer1.text: I don’t know how I ended up here... Where am I?

customer1.speaker: Customer
customer1.text: You are in ?????. Not a place for mortals like you. But... lucky for you, I can help.

customer1.speaker: Player
customer1.text: Help me? Why would you do that?

customer1.speaker: Customer
customer1.text: Because I pity you. Trapped here among the damned souls... You don’t belong. I know the way out.

customer1.speaker: Player
customer1.text: And why should I trust you?

customer1.speaker: Customer
customer1.text: Trust? You have no choice. Without me, you’ll wander here forever. With me... you escape. Simple.

customer1.speaker: Customer
customer1.text: Hah... Doubts will kill you faster than flames. Follow me, and I’ll take you to my office. From there... freedom is possible.
